SUMMARY: NESTED | FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD DETAIL: FIELD | CONSTR | METHOD

com.escape.games.model
Class Shader

java.lang.Object
  com.escape.games.model.Shader
All Implemented Interfaces:
GLResource
public class Shader
extends java.lang.Object
implements GLResource

Implementation for GL 2.x shader program. System-defined shaders use a pre-defined set of location names; use these in externally-defined shaders for compatibility with existing materials and geometries.

Author:
escape-llc

Method Detail

load

public void load(android.content.Context ctx)
Description copied from interface: GLResource
(Re)load the GL resources. Must be on GL thread.

Specified by:
load in interface GLResource
Parameters:
ctx - Source of resources.

unload

public void unload(android.content.Context ctx)
Description copied from interface: GLResource
Unload GL resources, if any. Delete DL resource, and clear out for subsequent call to load(). Must be on GL thread.

Specified by:
unload in interface GLResource
Parameters:
ctx - Source of resources.

release

public void release()
Description copied from interface: GLResource
Release all resources acquired. Do not call GL to delete anything; GL context is gone! Called from any thread. Prepare for a new call to load().

Specified by:
release in interface GLResource

setup

public void setup()
Select the shader program into GL context. Clear setup flags for glDisableVertexAttribArray() bookkeeping in teardown().

teardown

public void teardown()
Clean up shader program after rendering is complete. Disables all vertex attribute arrays that have setup flag true.

query

public boolean query(java.lang.String name)
Return whether the given Location exists. Should be called after load() is successfully completed. Consults the local map.

Parameters:
name - location name.
Returns:
true: available; false: not available.

queryUniform

public boolean queryUniform(java.lang.String name)
Return whether the given uniform exists. Queries the shader program directly.

Parameters:
name - uniform name.
Returns:
true: available; false: not available.

queryAttribute

public boolean queryAttribute(java.lang.String name)
Return whether the given attribute exists. Queries the shader program directly.

Parameters:
name - attribute name.
Returns:
true: available; false: not available.

checkGlError

public static void checkGlError(java.lang.String op)

create

public static Shader create(java.lang.String vs,
                            java.lang.String fs,
                            android.content.Context ctx,
                            android.opengl.GLSurfaceView sv)
Dispatch an operation to the GL thread to create a shader program. Waits for the operation to complete.

Parameters:
vs - Vertex shader source.
fs - Fragment shader source.
sv - Target GL Surface view.
Returns:
New shader or NULL.
